speech: I will charge your car at the best possible time for minimal carbon emissions. Please plug in your car no later than $chargeDay at $chargeTime to ensure timely charging. Would you like me to remind you to plug in?
Thank you. I will aim to minimize carbon emissions on your behalf. To ensure timely charging, you should plug in your car no later than $chargeDay at $chargeTime. Should I remind you?
I will charge your car. Please plug in your car no later than $chargeDay at $chargeTime to ensure timely charging. Would you like me to remind you?
